points.desc: Model identifier
points.label: Model ID
points.name: ID

points.desc: Model length
points.label: Model Length
points.name: L

points.desc: Setting for maximum power output. Default to WRtg.
points.label: WMax
points.name: WMax

points.desc: Voltage at the PCC.
points.label: VRef
points.name: VRef

points.desc: Offset  from PCC to inverter.
points.label: VRefOfs
points.name: VRefOfs

points.desc: Setpoint for maximum voltage.
points.label: VMax
points.name: VMax

points.desc: Setpoint for minimum voltage.
points.label: VMin
points.name: VMin

points.desc: Setpoint for maximum apparent power. Default to VARtg.
points.label: VAMax
points.name: VAMax

points.desc: Setting for maximum reactive power in quadrant 1. Default to VArRtgQ1.
points.label: VArMaxQ1
points.name: VArMaxQ1

points.desc: Setting for maximum reactive power in quadrant 2. Default to VArRtgQ2.
points.label: VArMaxQ2
points.name: VArMaxQ2

points.desc: Setting for maximum reactive power in quadrant 3. Default to VArRtgQ3.
points.label: VArMaxQ3
points.name: VArMaxQ3

points.desc: Setting for maximum reactive power in quadrant 4. Default to VArRtgQ4.
points.label: VArMaxQ4
points.name: VArMaxQ4

points.desc: Default ramp rate of change of active power due to command or internal action.
points.label: WGra
points.name: WGra

points.desc: Setpoint for minimum power factor value in quadrant 1. Default to PFRtgQ1.
points.label: PFMinQ1
points.name: PFMinQ1

points.desc: Setpoint for minimum power factor value in quadrant 2. Default to PFRtgQ2.
points.label: PFMinQ2
points.name: PFMinQ2

points.desc: Setpoint for minimum power factor value in quadrant 3. Default to PFRtgQ3.
points.label: PFMinQ3
points.name: PFMinQ3

points.desc: Setpoint for minimum power factor value in quadrant 4. Default to PFRtgQ4.
points.label: PFMinQ4
points.name: PFMinQ4

points.desc: VAR action on change between charging and discharging: 1=switch 2=maintain VAR characterization.
points.label: VArAct
points.name: VArAct

points.desc: Calculation method for total apparent power. 1=vector 2=arithmetic.
points.label: ClcTotVA
points.name: ClcTotVA

points.desc: Setpoint for maximum ramp rate as percentage of nominal maximum ramp rate. This setting will limit the rate that watts delivery to the grid can increase or decrease in response to intermittent PV generation.
points.label: MaxRmpRte
points.name: MaxRmpRte

points.desc: Setpoint for nominal frequency at the ECP.
points.label: ECPNomHz
points.name: ECPNomHz

points.desc: Identity of connected phase for single phase inverters. A=1 B=2 C=3.
points.label: ConnPh
points.name: ConnPh

points.desc: Scale factor for real power.
points.label: WMax_SF
points.name: WMax_SF

points.desc: Scale factor for voltage at the PCC.
points.label: VRef_SF
points.name: VRef_SF

points.desc: Scale factor for offset voltage.
points.label: VRefOfs_SF
points.name: VRefOfs_SF

points.desc: Scale factor for min/max voltages.
points.label: VMinMax_SF
points.name: VMinMax_SF

points.desc: Scale factor for apparent power.
points.label: VAMax_SF
points.name: VAMax_SF

points.desc: Scale factor for reactive power.
points.label: VArMax_SF
points.name: VArMax_SF

points.desc: Scale factor for default ramp rate.
points.label: WGra_SF
points.name: WGra_SF

points.desc: Scale factor for minimum power factor.
points.label: PFMin_SF
points.name: PFMin_SF

points.desc: Scale factor for maximum ramp percentage.

points.name: MaxRmpRte_SF

points.desc: Scale factor for nominal frequency.
